mc_user_reviews.text: Everybody's Fine was a fun touching movie with beautiful cinematography and good acting. Robert De Niro was absolutely fantastic in his role and the movie was never boring.

Everybody's Fine is a good family film that may have a few clichés but it does have a pretty strong cast with pretty good performances. Robert De Niro is great in this movie in a calm, laid back performance. This film is heart warming and it is easy to make connections with it. This film gives you a lot to think about.
